protocol_name: Wolsink et al. DUAL COGNITIVE PATHWAYS TO VOICE QUALITY. Extended methods experimental designs
protocol_name_html: Wolsink et al. DUAL COGNITIVE PATHWAYS TO VOICE QUALITY. Extended methods experimental designs
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fpeho","text":"These laboratory protocols contain more detailed information on the experimental methods of study 1 and 2 of the paper Dual Pathways to Voice Quality.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ceemo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74ec0","text":"The paper investigates the involvement of Working Memory Capacity (WMC, the cognitive resource necessary for controlled elaborate thinking) in voice behavior (speaking up with suggestions, problems, and opinions to change the organization). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pemo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctvp8","text":"The methods are designed to capture voice behavior in the laboratory.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Wolsink I, Den Hartog DN, Belschak FD, and Sligte IG, Under review at PlosOne
